text: The Women's 400m individual medley event at the 2010 South American Games was held on March 27, with the heats at 11:22 and the Final at 18:30. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Joanna Maranhão '''' |Larissa Cieslak '''' |Samantha Arevalo '''' |} ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=75% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2010 South American Games |- |World record | |4:29.45 |Beijing, China |10 August 2008 |- |Competition Record | |4:53.42 |Buenos Aires, Argentina |16 November 2006 |- |South American record | |4:37.51 |Athens, Greece |14 August 2004 |} ==Results== ===Heats=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" style="width:35em;" style="text- align:center" |- !Rank !!
